job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Company Information

   Syntho is a data technology organization with a strong expertise in AI-generated synthetic data, headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands. It was founded in 2020 with the goal of solving the global privacy dilemma and enable the open data economy, where data can be used and shared freely and privacy guaranteed. We offer privacy-preserving synthetic data to unlock your data and take away legitimate privacy concerns.

   As startup, Syntho has ambitious plans in the upcoming years and we're growing really fast. Want to grow your career and be at the forefront of data-driven innovation? Then we're looking for you!

   Role Description
     * Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end.
     * Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems.
     * A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions.
     * Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution.
     * Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution.
     * Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments.
     * Doing good - contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of snacks, drinks, birthday treats, and social events.
     * Great and easy accessible office location in Amsterdam.

     * A startup mindset and ambition to work in a startup environment.
     * Master's degree in Computing Science, Artificial Intelligence, Econometrics, Physics or Mathematics.
     * Expertise and interest in various programming languages (whereof Python).
     * Experience with synthetic data is a plus.
     * Experience with Docker and CI/CD practices.
     * Experience with several cloud providers such as AWS, Azure, GCP etc.
     * Experience as a software developer / engineer.
     * Knowledge & interest in our technology and our target groups.
     * Ability to become proficient with our solution quickly and understand our products' technical capabilities.
     * Energetic and proactive personality.
     * Professional fluency in English.

   Over het bedrijf:
   Syntho
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Software Engineer

Company Information

   Syntho is a data technology organization with a strong expertise in AI-generated synthetic data, headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands. It was founded in 2020 with the goal of solving the global privacy dilemma and enable the open data economy, where data can be used and shared freely and privacy guaranteed. We offer privacy-preserving synthetic data to unlock your data and take away legitimate privacy concerns.

   As startup, Syntho has ambitious plans in the upcoming years and we're growing really fast. Want to grow your career and be at the forefront of data-driven innovation? Then we're looking for you!

   Role Description
     * Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end.
     * Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems.
     * A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions.
     * Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution.
     * Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution.
     * Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments.
     * Doing good - contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of snacks, drinks, birthday treats, and social events.
     * Great and easy accessible office location in Amsterdam.

     * A startup mindset and ambition to work in a startup environment.
     * Master's degree in Computing Science, Artificial Intelligence, Econometrics, Physics or Mathematics.
     * Expertise and interest in various programming languages (whereof Python).
     * Experience with synthetic data is a plus.
     * Experience with Docker and CI/CD practices.
     * Experience with several cloud providers such as AWS, Azure, GCP etc.
     * Experience as a software developer / engineer.
     * Knowledge & interest in our technology and our target groups.
     * Ability to become proficient with our solution quickly and understand our products' technical capabilities.
     * Energetic and proactive personality.
     * Professional fluency in English.

   Over het bedrijf:
   Syntho

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building applications with Generative AI models, interfacing with back-end systems using Python and FastAPI, and improving/extending software functionalities. While it mentions 'Machine Learning Software Engineer' in the title, the core responsibilities and technologies like 'Generative AI models' and the focus on building a 'Syntho Engine Core Application' align more closely with the GenAI Engineer profile, which specializes in developing applications on top of generative models and maintaining production-grade user-facing systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end' directly describes the development of software applications and their integration with back-end systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems' indicates the core task of creating and deploying machine learning models.
job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions' highlights involvement in the broader software development lifecycle and decision-making.
job_tasks.phrase: A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution' refers to enhancing and maintaining existing software features.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution' describes the process of adding new capabilities to the software.
job_tasks.phrase: Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution' implies involvement in strategic planning and understanding the business direction for the solution.
job_tasks.phrase: Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Experience with synthetic data is a plus' suggests a connection to modeling techniques, specifically in the domain of synthetic data generation.
job_tasks.phrase: Experience with synthetic data is a plus
